00001 #include "ros/ros.h"
00002 #include "last_letter/c_lift_a.h"
00003 #include "math.h"
00004 
00005 bool c_lift_a_callback(last_letter::c_lift_a::Request &req, last_letter::c_lift_a::Response &res)
00006 {
00007         double alpha = req.alpha;
00008         double M, alpha0, c_lift_0, c_lift_a;
00009         ros::param::getCached("/airframe/mcoeff",M);
00010         ros::param::getCached("/airframe/alpha_stall",alpha0);
00011         ros::param::getCached("/airframe/c_lift_0",c_lift_0);
00012         ros::param::getCached("/airframe/c_lift_a",c_lift_a);
00013         
00014         double sigmoid = ( 1+exp(-M*(alpha-alpha0))+exp(M*(alpha+alpha0)) ) / (1+exp(-M*(alpha-alpha0))) / (1+exp(M*(alpha+alpha0)));
00015         double linear = (1-sigmoid) * (c_lift_0 + c_lift_a*alpha); //Lift at small AoA
00016         double flatPlate = sigmoid*(2*copysign(1,alpha)*pow(sin(alpha),2)*cos(alpha)); //Lift beyond stall
00017         
00018         res.c_lift_a = linear+flatPlate;
00019         
00020         return true;
00021 }
00022 
00023 int main(int argc, char **argv)
00024 {
00025         ros::init(argc, argv, "c_lift_a_server");
00026         ros::NodeHandle n;
00027 
00028         ros::ServiceServer service = n.advertiseService("c_lift_a",c_lift_a_callback);
00029         ROS_INFO("c_lift_a_server ready");
00030         ros::spin();
00031 
00032         return 0;
00033 }
